noCommandMessage: Sorry. I couldn't find any command in your message. List the available commands using /help
blacklistedMessage: Sorry, we cannot process your message as we detected it in the blacklist
whitelistedMessage: Sorry, we cannot process your message as we could not find it in whitelist
unknownCommandMessage: Sorry. I do not know anything about your command. List the available commands using /help
